constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 148 (Friday, August 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CLARKE of New York:
H.R. 5056.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H4343]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax credits for carriage of independent programmers by qualified distributors and multichannel video programming distributors.
